name: The Skeleton Project
description:
Welcome to perhaps the first ever (and certainly worst ever) game built in Inductive Automation's "Ignition" software. Ignition is a free software used around the world for SCADA, IIoT, MES, HMI, and lots of other acronyms you don't need to worry about. It wasn't designed for games, but I have some downtime.

You gotta click a button and get in a taxi. After that you gotta drink a tall glass of water. In real life. Cause water's good for you.

It's a good software to learn if you wanna make a boatload of money though!
